metadata.title: CVE-2020-1776 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
When an agent user is renamed or set to invalid the session belonging tothe user is keept active. The session can not be used to access ticket datain the case the agent is invalid. This issue affects ((OTRS)) CommunityEdition: 6.0.28 and prior versions. OTRS: 7.0.18 and prior versions, 8.0.4.and prior versions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-1776` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.29-1
otrs2 - 6.0.29-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.29-1').
